p: Reactive oxygen species generated in stressed plant cells were highly cytotoxic. These compounds were controlled by different antioxidant defense system enzymes. Different abiotic stressors led to increased antioxidant enzymes. [ 34] showed that peroxidase activity increased significantly with the increase in lead concentrations, from 50% to more than 100% at high lead concentrations. The results from [ 15] indicated high peroxidase activity under moderate drought conditions. Our study supports these results by showing an average 27.39% enhancement of peroxidase activity under water-deficiency conditions ( Table 2).
